thread.title: Battery truck rolls over in Charlotte
thread.title_full: Battery truck rolls over in Charlotte - WCAX.COM Local Vermont News, Weather and Sports-

author: WCAX News
title: Battery truck rolls over in Charlotte
text:
CHARLOTTE, Vt. - Emergency crews responded to a battery truck rollover Monday morning in Charlotte.
The Interstate Battery truck went off Ferry Road and landed on its side. Some of the batteries fell off the truck, but no hazardous materials leaked, and no injuries were reported.
